input.sentences: they put together a pool for the animals .
the kids were able to play with them
and they touched many of the animals .
they were taught about the animals
and they enjoyed their day of learning .
output.sentences: In preparation for the school visit, the aquarium keepers placed some animals in a kiddie pool.
To the kids though, this seems like a fun play time.
Under the guidance of the keepers, many children touched the various animals.
With their interest piqued, the keepers taught the kids even more about the animals.
Everyone truly enjoyed the day of learning.
